sentences.sentence: Many U.S. cities now have nonstop flights to Aspen.
sentences.translation: 很多美国城市现在都有飞往亚斯本的直飞航班。

sentences.sentence: My son went to Aspen, in Colorado. Now he and his wife are people who love a quiet holiday.
sentences.translation: 我儿子去了科罗拉多的阿斯彭。你要知道，他和他妻子是喜欢安静假期的人。

sentences.sentence: "My God, what an idea!" Greene said at a recent gathering at the Aspen Institute.
sentences.translation: “天哪，多棒的主意！”格林最近在阿斯彭研究所的一次聚会上说道。
